name: Deus Ex
content:
files:
- setup: N/A:Select GOG's setup file
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/GOG Games/Deus Ex GOTY/System/DeusEx.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: vcrun2012 vcrun2013 vcrun2015 win7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    args: /SP- /SUPPRESSMSGBOXES /NOCANCEL /DIR="C:\GOG Games\Deus Ex GOTY"
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Deus Ex GOTY/System/DeusEx.ini
    key: GameRenderDevice
    section: Engine.Engine
    value: OpenGLDrv.OpenGLRenderDevice
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Deus Ex GOTY/System/DeusEx.ini
    key: FirstRun
    section: FirstRun
    value: 1100
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Deus Ex GOTY/System/DeusEx.ini
    key: FullscreenColorBits
    section: WinDrv.WindowsClient
    value: 32
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Deus Ex GOTY/System/DeusEx.ini
    key: FullscreenViewportX
    section: WinDrv.WindowsClient
    value: 1280
- write_config:
    file: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/GOG Games/Deus Ex GOTY/System/DeusEx.ini
    key: FullscreenViewportY
    section: WinDrv.WindowsClient
    value: 1024
